text: Ilie-Constantin Ciotoiu (born ) is a Romanian male weightlifter, competing in the 56 kg category and representing Romania at international competitions. He competed at world championships, including at the 2015 World Weightlifting Championships. At the 2017 European Weightlifting Championships Ciotoiu won 2 bronze medals, at Clean & Jerk and overall ranking.Halterofilul Ilie Ciotoiu a cucerit două medalii de bronz la Europenele din Croația ==Major results== {|class = "wikitable" style="text-align:center;" ! rowspan=2 width=40|Year ! rowspan=2 width=250|Venue ! rowspan=2 width=60|Weight !colspan=4| Snatch (kg) !colspan=4| Clean & Jerk (kg) !rowspan=2 width=40| Total !rowspan=2 width=40| Rank |- ! width=40|1!! width=40|2!! width=40|3!! width=40|Rank!! width=40|1!! width=40|2!! width=40|3!! width=40|Rank |- ! colspan=13|World Championships |- |2015 || align=left| Houston, United States|| 56 kg || ~~104~~ || ~~104~~ || ~~104~~ ||---||133|| ~~136~~ || ~~136~~ ||22||0||--- |- ! colspan=13|European Championships |- |2017 || align=left| Split, Croatia|| 56 kg || 108 || 111 || ~~115~~ || || ~~131~~ ||131 || ~~140~~ || || 242 || |} ==References== Category:1995 births Category:Living people Category:Romanian male weightlifters Category:Place of birth missing (living people) Category:European Weightlifting Championships medalists
